trans-unit.source: Normal Distribution Web Service Suite | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Normal Distribution Web Service Suite | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: The Normal Distribution Suite is a set of sample web services ([Generator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndg7), [Quantile Calculator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndq5), [Probability Calculator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndp5)) that help in generating and handling normal distributions.
trans-unit.target: The Normal Distribution Suite is a set of sample web services ([Generator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndg7), [Quantile Calculator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndq5), [Probability Calculator]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/ndp5)) that help in generating and handling normal distributions.

trans-unit.source: The services allow generating a normal distribution sequence of any length, calculating quantiles from a given probability, and calculating probability from a given quantile.
trans-unit.target: The services allow generating a normal distribution sequence of any length, calculating quantiles from a given probability, and calculating probability from a given quantile.

trans-unit.source: Each of the services emits different outputs based on the selected service (see description below).
trans-unit.target: Each of the services emits different outputs based on the selected service (see description below).

trans-unit.source: The Normal Distribution Suite is based on the R functions qnorm, rnorm, and pnorm, which are included in R stats package.
trans-unit.target: The Normal Distribution Suite is based on the R functions qnorm, rnorm, and pnorm, which are included in R stats package.

trans-unit.source: This web service could be consumed by users – potentially through a mobile app, through a website, or even on a local computer, for example.
trans-unit.target: This web service could be consumed by users – potentially through a mobile app, through a website, or even on a local computer, for example.

trans-unit.source: But the purpose of the web service is also to serve as an example of how Azure Machine Learning can be used to create web services on top of R code.
trans-unit.target: But the purpose of the web service is also to serve as an example of how Azure Machine Learning can be used to create web services on top of R code.

trans-unit.source: With just a few lines of R code and clicks of a button within Azure Machine Learning Studio, an experiment can be created with R code and published as a web service.
trans-unit.target: With just a few lines of R code and clicks of a button within Azure Machine Learning Studio, an experiment can be created with R code and published as a web service.

trans-unit.source: The web service can then be published to the Azure Marketplace and consumed by users and devices across the world with no infrastructure setup by the author of the web service.
trans-unit.target: The web service can then be published to the Azure Marketplace and consumed by users and devices across the world with no infrastructure setup by the author of the web service.

trans-unit.source: The Normal Distribution Suite includes the following 3 services.
trans-unit.target: The Normal Distribution Suite includes the following 3 services.

trans-unit.source: This service accepts 4 arguments of a normal distribution and calculates the associated quantile.
trans-unit.target: This service accepts 4 arguments of a normal distribution and calculates the associated quantile.

trans-unit.source: p - A single probability of an event with normal distribution.
trans-unit.target: p - A single probability of an event with normal distribution.

trans-unit.source: SD - The normal distribution standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: SD - The normal distribution standard deviation.

trans-unit.source: Side - L for the lower side of the distribution and U for the upper side of the distribution.
trans-unit.target: Side - L for the lower side of the distribution and U for the upper side of the distribution.

trans-unit.source: The output of the service is the calculated quantile that is associated with the given probability.
trans-unit.target: The output of the service is the calculated quantile that is associated with the given probability.

trans-unit.source: This service accepts 4 arguments of a normal distribution and calculates the associated probability.
trans-unit.target: This service accepts 4 arguments of a normal distribution and calculates the associated probability.

trans-unit.source: q - A single quantile of an event with normal distribution.
trans-unit.target: q - A single quantile of an event with normal distribution.

trans-unit.source: SD - The normal distribution standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: SD - The normal distribution standard deviation.

trans-unit.source: Side - L for the lower side of the distribution and U for the upper side of the distribution.
trans-unit.target: Side - L for the lower side of the distribution and U for the upper side of the distribution.

trans-unit.source: The output of the service is the calculated probability that is associated with the given quantile.
trans-unit.target: The output of the service is the calculated probability that is associated with the given quantile.

trans-unit.source: This service accepts 3 arguments of a normal distribution and generates a random sequence of numbers that are normally distributed.
trans-unit.target: This service accepts 3 arguments of a normal distribution and generates a random sequence of numbers that are normally distributed.

trans-unit.source: The following arguments should be provided to it within the request:
trans-unit.target: The following arguments should be provided to it within the request:

trans-unit.source: sd - The normal distribution standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: sd - The normal distribution standard deviation.

trans-unit.source: The output of the service is a sequence of length n with a normal distribution based on the mean and sd arguments.
trans-unit.target: The output of the service is a sequence of length n with a normal distribution based on the mean and sd arguments.

trans-unit.source: This service, as hosted on the Azure Marketplace, is an OData service; these may be called through POST or GET methods.
trans-unit.target: This service, as hosted on the Azure Marketplace, is an OData service; these may be called through POST or GET methods.

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways of consuming the service in an automated fashion (example apps are here: [Generator](http://microsoftazuremachinelearning.azurewebsites.net/NormalDistributionGenerator.aspx),
trans-unit.target: There are multiple ways of consuming the service in an automated fashion (example apps are here: [Generator](http://microsoftazuremachinelearning.azurewebsites.net/NormalDistributionGenerator.aspx),

trans-unit.target: Starting C# code for web service consumption:

trans-unit.source: This web service was created using Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: This web service was created using Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: For a free trial, as well as introductory videos on creating experiments and [publishing web services](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md), please see [azure.com/ml](http://azure.com/ml).
trans-unit.target: For a free trial, as well as introductory videos on creating experiments and [publishing web services](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md), please see [azure.com/ml](http://azure.com/ml).

trans-unit.target: Below is a screenshot of the experiment that created the web service and example code for each of the modules within the experiment.

trans-unit.source: These are very simple examples surrounding the normal distribution.
trans-unit.target: These are very simple examples surrounding the normal distribution.

trans-unit.source: As can be seen from the example code above, little error catching is implemented.
trans-unit.target: As can be seen from the example code above, little error catching is implemented.

trans-unit.target: For frequently asked questions on consumption of the web service or publishing to the Azure Marketplace, see [here](machine-learning-marketplace-faq.md).
